remark.p: Counselor on International Law, Office of the Legal Adviser, Department of State, Chairman of the National Security Council Interagency Task Force on the Law of the Sea, Deputy Special Representative of the President for the Third United Nations Law of the Sea Conference and Deputy Chief of Delegation, until March 1976

Counselor on International Law, Office of the Legal Adviser, Department of State; Chairman of the National Security Council Interagency Task Force on the Law of the Sea, Deputy Special Representative of the President for the third United Nations Law of the Sea Conference and Deputy Chief of Delegation, until March 1976
